function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low weighted average scores in group ratings","Impact":"Could indicate dissatisfaction or lack of confidence in items or entities","Mitigation":"Conduct a survey to identify the reasons behind the low scores and take corrective actions","Technologies":"Survey tools and data analysis software","People":"Participants in the survey","Owner":"Survey administrators"},{"Description":"Perceived status changes between rounds","Impact":"Indicates fluctuating perceptions of item or entity status over time","Mitigation":"Provide continuous updates and communication to address concerns and maintain transparency","Technologies":"Communication platforms and feedback tools","People":"Admins or managers overseeing the rating process","Owner":"Management team"},{"Description":"Preparedness ratings for handling the impact of COVID-19","Impact":"Reflects beliefs about the ability to handle the pandemic's impact","Mitigation":"Implement appropriate measures based on the preparedness ratings to address gaps and improve response","Technologies":"Health and safety protocols, training resources","People":"Individuals responsible for health and safety measures","Owner":"Health and safety management team"}]}
